title: S3 Rank
body:
Can anyone tell me where I can find out what my S3 rank was?  That was when I first started playing ranked, but I forget where I ended up.

Obviously it isn't of vital importance, but if anyone could point me in the right direction, it'd be much appreciated. :)

replies.body:
lolking shows the last 3 years I think but not the division for the previous years but only for the current year for ranked.  For example 
S4 Bronze  S5 Silver  S6 Silver 2

I don't think any site will go back that for from my knowledge.  Sorry
Yeah I tried lolking earlier.  Thanks anyway :)
